response:
Unilateral pyramidal signs in the left leg (spasticity, hyper-reflexia, extensor plantar) with preserved arms and cranial nerves, ipsilateral loss of vibration/proprioception and contralateral loss of pinprick below a truncal sensory level, plus positive Romberg, form a Brown-Sequard pattern localising to a left thoracic spinal cord hemisection.

lesion_locations = ["left thoracic spinal cord"]
